title: Refugees Can't Be Vetted
summary: Refugees receive multiple background checks, taking up to two years.

checks.name: The New York Times
checks.shortQuote: Refugees receive multiple background checks, taking up to two years.

checks.name: The Washington Post
checks.shortQuote: This is false. The vetting of refugees is careful and takes about two years, including FBI screening, Department of Homeland Security interviews and extensive security and background checks.
